feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.12
entry.content:
This release incledes a small follow-up fix to v1.16.11.

Changelog

  • 73386c947fb2664bfb4be522963638c99a62bc5a [#946] fix: ensure the same config file is passed down to retry and restart execution as wel (#948)

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.0
entry.content:
Version 1.17.0 brings lots of improvements and several exciting new features! Huge thanks to everyone who contributed. Check out the changelog for all the details.

All changes

  • [#785] persistence: feat: refactor history data structure to save DAG information by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/868
  • [#786] Concurrent execution for a same DAG by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/886
  • Optimize Docker image size and split into three base-line image by @jerry-yuan in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/895
  • frontend: Migrate MUI to shadcn by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/908
  • feat: allow specify container name and image platform by @vnghia in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/898
  • Use same request ID for sub-DAG retries by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/911
  • Update dependencies: YAML parser migration and other library upgrades by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/913
  • Improve security by updating file and directory permissions by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/921
  • Add endpoints for managing sub-DAG runs by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/915
  • Implement paginated log loading by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/923
  • Implement workflow details page for child workflows by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/927
  • [#918] Evaluated conditions and command arguments should be visible on the Web UI by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/930
  • [#933] Status-wise search for execution history API & UI by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/936
  • [#887] Fix: do not read DAGs in sub-directories by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/950
  • [#925] feat: Support nix shell by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/951
  • [#687] Separate log files for stdout and stderr by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/952
  • [#938] Enqueue API by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/954
  • feat: enhance repeat policy with condition, expected output and exit code checks by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/953
  • [#955] fix: queue cpu consumption by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/956
  • fix(ui): wrong import path by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/958
  • [#942] Add permissions field to the config by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/962
  • Fix: handle queue item with wrong status properly by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/963
  • fix: start button to enqueue QueueItem by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/964
  • [#965] fix: 404 error for different host name and port by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/966
  • [fb-next] Command for migrating history data from v1.16.x to v1.17.x by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/969
  • [fb-1.17.0-beta] Start command should DAG-run without queueing when no other process by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/972
  • Fix: version name issue by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/973
  • [#967] fix: shell options are not working by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/974
  • fix: failing job for building dev Docker image by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/975
  • [#802] fix: remove pid and location fields from API responses for security by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/979
  • [#965] fix: remove restrictive step name validation by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/980
  • [#965] Fix: docker executor does not print stderr log by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/981
  • [#982] feat: reduce log file size with path placeholders in status JSON by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/983
  • revert: [#982] feat: reduce log file size with path placeholders in s‚Ä¶ by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/984
  • feat: Improve status command by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/988
  • [#989] feat: Parallel execution by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/993
  • [#998] feat: implement chain type by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1000
  • [#992] feat: implement queue configuration by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1001
  • [#994] support multiple DAGs in single YAML file by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1005
  • feat: Adds a /api/v2/metrics endpoint that exposes Prometheus-compatible metrics by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1008
  • fix: prevent step hanging when output exceeds 64KB by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1010
  • feat: add Partial Success status to DAG runs by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1011
  • feat: add optional step ID field by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1012
  • doc: create a new documentation site by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1018
  • docs: Migrate to new doc website by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1020
  • chore: Update dockerfile by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1021
  • fix: support repeat policy for nested DAGs by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1022
  • [#1013] fix: prevent zombie processes in DAG execution by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1024
  • [#1003,#999] fix(ui): set remote node properly by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1025

New Contributors

  • @jerry-yuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/895

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.12...v1.17.0

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.1
entry.content:
This release fixes a few rough edges in v1.17.0 and slips in some handy extras.

Contributors ‚ú®

Thanks to our contributors for this release: Feature | Contributors -- | -- One-click step re-run ‚Äì retry an individual step without touching the rest of the DAG | üõ†Ô∏è @thefishhat Nested-DAG log viewer ‚Äì see logs for every repeated child run | üí° @jeremydelattre59 Docker image ‚Äì fixes for asset paths & storage volumes | üê≥ @jhuang732 (report)

All Changes

  • fix: support camel case for step exit code field by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1031
  • feat: add dag step rerun by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1030
  • fix: asset serving with base path and Docker storage location by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1037
  • fix: display logs from all repeated child DAG runs by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1039
  • [Snyk] Upgrade lucide from 0.507.0 to 0.511.0 by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1035
  • [Snyk] Upgrade openapi-fetch from 0.13.8 to 0.14.0 by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1036

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.0...v1.17.1

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.2
entry.content:
This is a minor change release that includes the fix for the output capturing issue in the HTTP executor, as reported in #1040 (thanks to @nightly-brew).

All changes

  • fix: HTTP executor output not written to stdout by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.1...v1.17.2

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.3
entry.content:
This release includes some bug fixes in v1.17, along with a new feature for the HTTP executor.

New Features

  • HTTP Executor: Added skipTLSVerify option to support self-signed certificates (#1046)

Bug Fixes

  • fix: environment variable evaluation and test improvements by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1045
  • feat: add skipTLSVerify option to HTTP executor for self-signed certificates by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1046
  • fix: retry individual dag step by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1049
  • [#1048] fix: correct repeatPolicy documentation by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1056
  • fix: separate stdout and stderr streams in SSH executor by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1057
  • fix: repeat policy non zero exit codes by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1052
  • fix: DAGU_DAGS_DIR environment variable not recognized by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1060

Documentation

  • Repeat Policy: Corrected documentation and examples to accurately describe behavior (#1056)

Contributors

Thanks to our contributors for this release:

| Contribution | Author | |--------------|--------| | HTTP executor skipTLSVerify feature | @mnmercer (report), @nightly-brew (feedback) | | DAGU_DAGS_DIR environment variable fix | @Daffdi (report) | | SSH executor stdout/stderr separation | @NebulaCoding1029 (report) | | Repeat policy bug fixes and documentation | @jeremydelattre59 (reports) | | Retry individual step UI fix | @jeremydelattre59 (report), @thefishhat (implementation) | | Environment variable evaluation fixes | @jhuang732 (report) |
